[[GMA Network]] (1986-1998)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 1 kilowatt| homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv/ People's Television Network]| }} '''DXBN-TV''', channel 9, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]]. Its studio and transmitter facility is located at Libertad, Butuan City. ==See also== *[[People's Television Network]] {{Butuan City TV}} {{NBN Mindanao}} [[Category:Television stations in Butuan]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[Category:NBN stations]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[ceb:DXBN-TV]] [[tl:DXBN-TV]]
